If after your 12th class you plan on pursuing a degree in the UK then you can apply for the UniAcco Fly High Scholarship. This scholarship is mainly for Indian students who are looking to pursue their further education in a UK university. The £6,500 scholarship is divided into 3 categories - Responsible Leader- For the year 2020, they will be offering 2 scholarships worth £1000 each to a student who has worked dedicatedly towards a social/noble cause. Indian students currently pursuing any postgraduate course in the UK or beginning a postgraduate course in the UK in the year 2020 are eligible to apply. Passionate Scholar- For the year 2020, they will be offering 4 scholarships worth £750 each to students who have either demonstrated academic excellence or worked dedicatedly to achieve significant honors at major forums in their respective fields of study. Indian students currently pursuing any postgraduate course in the UK or beginning a postgraduate course in the UK in the year 2020 are eligible to apply. All Rounder- For the year 2020, they will be offering 2 scholarships worth £750 each to students who have worked hard to develop a holistic profile. Indian students currently pursuing any undergraduate course in the UK or beginning an undergraduate course in the UK in the year 2020 are eligible to apply. The deadline to apply for this scholarship is 15th September, 2020 and the results will be announced on 24th October 2020.
